name: Gertie the Rat in... "CIRCUS ESCAPE!"
description:
Sold to the circus at a young age, Gertie the Rat always assumed she was an orphan. One day she learns her parents are still alive but the cruel Ringmaster locks her up in his wagon to prevent her from meeting them. Help Gertie escape by finding clues around the wagon in this touching point-and-click escape the room game.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021, "Lost And Found"

Controls

The only control is point and click. Colour and audio is not necessary to playthrough the game.

Credits

Programming by Lalaine Ulit-Destajo
Art by Keke Zhou
Music by John McKinnon & Urim Park
